Package algorithms.paths

Class DP_Recursive

  • java.lang.Object
    • algorithms.paths.DP_Anyk_Iterator
      • algorithms.paths.DP_Recursive
  • public class DP_Recursive
extends DP_Anyk_Iterator
    Implementation of Anyk-Rec for DP, a ranked enumeration algorithm that relies on recursion: a node finds the next best solution by recursively finding the next best solutions of its children.
    Brief description of the algorithm: Each node maintains a priority queue DP_DecisionSet.pq_rec with the current candidates for the next best suffix solution (from the current node to the terminal). The method get_next() works by popping from that PQ and replacing that candidate with a suffix solution that goes to the same child but then takes the next best path from the child (determined recursively with find_next_recursive(entities.paths.DP_Suffix_Solution)). The ranked order of the suffix solutions from a particular node is also stored with DP_Suffix_Solution.next pointers and reused among different find_next_recursive(entities.paths.DP_Suffix_Solution) calls. This provides a speedup as the computation keeps going.
    Since multiple nodes could share the same decisions, we maintain the PQs at DP_DecisionSet objects instead of DP_State_Node.
    Author:
    Nikolaos Tziavelis
    See Also:
    Ranked Enumeration Algorithm

    • Method Detail

      • initialize_pq

        private void initialize_pq​(DP_DecisionSet curr_decisionSet)
        Initializes the data strucures that the algorithm needs. We initialize a PQ that has each decision concatenated with the best path from the child. Not needed for the decisions that lead to the terminal node - no PQ is needed there.
        Parameters:
        curr_decisionSet - The current set of decisions to be initialized.

      • get_best_suffix_solution

        private DP_Suffix_Solution get_best_suffix_solution​(DP_State_Node curr_node)
        Computes the best suffix solution that starts from a node
        Parameters:
        curr_node - The starting node.
        Returns:
        DP_Suffix_Solution The best suffix solution.

      • get_next

        public DP_Solution get_next()
        Description copied from class: DP_Anyk_Iterator
        Computes the next DP solution of DP_Anyk_Iterator.instance in ranked order (ascending cost). Ties are broken arbitrarily.
        Specified by:
        get_next in class DP_Anyk_Iterator
        Returns:
        DP_Solution The next best DP solution or null if there are no other solutions.

      • find_next_recursive

        private DP_Suffix_Solution find_next_recursive​(DP_Suffix_Solution curr)
        Determines the next best suffix solution that starts from a node recursively.
        Parameters:
        curr - The suffix solution whose next will be computed.
        Returns:
        DP_Suffix_Solution
